name: sUwUer
description:
Oh no.

There is a monster behind you.

Run away in the spooky sUwUer, but you can't look ahead and run at the same time ! Good luck. 

Space : Jump
Left click : Switch between running but looking back or seeing ahead but tand still. 

Made by students of the Université de Lorraine for the Spooky2DJam 2021.

Art

Rana (Instagram)

Tanguy Charton (Twitch)

Assets used

Sound effects : GameAudioGDC by sonniss (Link).

Have fun ❤
